page.shortlink: api client api a5 listbox group object

property.name: order
property.description: The order that the list should use for the grouping. See *[link:A5.ListBox.setOrder]*.

property.name: group
property.description: A function that returns the group name for the passed in data. Each time the result of the function changes, and new group header is drawn. This means that the "order" property of this object should handle the correct ordering of the data, which happens before the group function is called. For example if a contacts list was being made, the "order" might be on the "LastName" column and the "group" function might return the first letter of the "LastName" column.

argument.name: data
argument.description: The data for a list row that is to be grouped.

property.name: header
property.description: Settings for the group header. This will be inserted into the list as a group title item.

property.name: html
property.description: A function that generates HTML for the group header. By default it will return the group name.

argument.name: group
argument.description: The name of the current group, as returned by the group function.

argument.name: data
argument.description: The rows of data for the current group.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on a group header.

property.name: show
property.description: Whether or not to show the group footer. The default value is false.

property.name: html
property.description: A function that generates HTML for the group footer.

argument.name: group
argument.description: The name of the current group, as returned by the group function.

argument.name: data
argument.description: The rows of data for the current group.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on a group footer.
